mapper.insert: INSERT INTO actorfav(actorfavno, memberno, actorno) VALUES (actorfav_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{actorno})
mapper.select: SELECT actorfavno, memberno, actorno FROM actorfav ORDER BY actorfavno DESC

SELECT a.actorno, a.actornameen, a.actornamekr, a.actorpic, m.memberno, x.actorfavno FROM actor a, member m, actorfav x WHERE a.actorno=x.actorno AND m.memberno = x.memberno AND x.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY actorfavno DESC
